title: Fix and Finalize Auto-Onboarding Protocol
summary: Ensure onboarding flow is intuitive, narratively rich, memory-linked, and self-aware. Adds auto-loading narrative files and routable summaries.
origin: User feedback after testing onboarding behavior post-stable release
motivations: Auto-onboarding was technically correct but lacked context, narrative, and self-awareness.
First-time experience must reflect the system’s true structure, values, and usability.
targets: Memory + router integration for onboarding reflection
